name: IP_DEVICE_CAPTURE
description: This table contains device capture information for the given Inpatient Data (INP) record.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the inpatient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INST_START_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the start instant of capture for the associated device.

columns.name: DEVICE_ID
columns.description: This column displays the unique ID of the associated device record.

columns.name: SELECT_VAR_IDS
columns.description: This column displays the ID of the associated variable record.

columns.name: ATTACH_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the instant at which the associated device record was attached to the patient for the given encounter.

columns.name: REMOVE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the instant at which the associated device record was removed from the patient for the given encounter.

columns.name: INSTANT_TO_VAL_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the instant at which the associated device was validated.

columns.name: VALIDATED_USER_ID
columns.description: This column displays the users who validated the associated device.

columns.name: VALIDATED_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LINKED_ORD_ID
columns.description: This column displays the order ID that is linked with the device

columns.name: SECONDARY_ORD_ID
columns.description: This column displays the secondary order id when second order is linked to the device

columns.name: LINE_NUMBER
columns.description: This column stores the audit trail line number for edited device data.

columns.name: FLO_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: This column displays the flowsheet template that will be updated when device data is filed in the flowsheet.

columns.name: FLO_TEMPLATE_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: DRCT_CPTR_INTERVAL
columns.description: Interval for direct capture of Anesthesia device data, in minutes

columns.name: AUTOFILE_EFF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which Auto Filing for this device association was enabled or disabled (as described in I INP 9160).

columns.name: AUTO_FILE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether device data is auto filed for this device association
